item.title: Brown-bag session: refactoring legacy code
item.description: Today I have done a brown bag session about refactoring legacy code. It includes: legacy code definition. There is no agreement about this in the team. the legacy code change algorithm (source is Feathers, Working effectively with legacy code). Plus an example about it. working with legacy code experience with it. The slides are available here (PDF format) We also did a practical session, whose experience report is here
